name: Bowling Defense
description:
How to play

Bowling pins are coming to get you! Don't let any on them reach the other end of the bridge! Game ends if even one of them touches your platform.

Earn 100 points for hiting bouling pin directly or 50 points for pushing them off the edge. Score is saved online. Don't forget to enter your name at the start menu!

Every new wave they evole a little, increasing move speed and getting smaller - this is shown by different color rings around them.

Controls

A/D - move left/right
Space - throw ball

Sound assets come from asset bundles: "Universal Sound FX" and "Ultimate Game Music Collection". Everything else is made by myself.
